name: HüttenDaddy (non VR skii simulator)
description:
HüttenDaddy is an artful experience midway between listening to a song and playing a game! Beat the highscore for Maximum Dad Energy.

--- Press Enter to restart if you are Game Over ---

Idea - Everyone

  • Marie Biedermann (bottom) - Food, Music,  Sound Engineering
  • Francesco Marcuzzi (right) - Food, Music,  Sound Engineering
  • Rachel Gorden (mid right) - Food, Artist, Whispering, Level Design
  • Josef Kümmel (mid left) - Artist, Animation, Level Design, FX  Particles
  • Ferdinand Köppen (left) - Programming, Level Design, Unity

This game was developed during the 2nd Hüttenjam on the Turracher Mountains.
